title: Replace founder profile image with BarnaliFinalSSize.png using ultra-aggressive cache-busting

quotes: i'm attaching here again small size image than previous.. please replace this perfectly

requirements.text: Implement triple-layer cache-busting strategy: (1) use completely unique filename never used before, (2) append timestamp query parameter to image URL, and (3) add HTTP cache-control meta tags in the image loading logic to prevent browser caching

quotes: i;ve tried all the above 1,2,3 method but still same issue

acceptanceCriteria: Image URL includes timestamp query parameter that changes on each deployment
Image element includes cache-control attributes or wrapping div with cache-prevention properties
Component code explicitly sets cache-control headers or meta tags for the founder image

requirements.text: Add explicit cache-invalidation mechanism in the CoreTeam component by including a unique cache-busting key based on build timestamp or version number that forces React to treat the image as a completely new element
acceptanceCriteria: Image element includes a unique key prop based on version or timestamp
React treats the founder image as a new element requiring fresh render
Component forces re-mount of image element on version change
Developer tools show image request with updated cache-busting parameters
